name: Wireless Noise-Cancelling Headphones
description: Premium over-ear headphones with active noise cancellation, 30-hour battery life, and superior comfort for all-day wear.

name: Mechanical Gaming Keyboard
description: RGB backlit mechanical keyboard with tactile switches, programmable keys, and anti-ghosting for competitive gaming.

name: USB-C 7-in-1 Hub
description: Compact aluminum hub with HDMI 4K, SD/microSD readers, and 3 USB 3.0 ports. Perfect for laptops and tablets.

name: Smart Fitness Watch
description: Track heart rate, steps, sleep, and workouts with water-resistant design and 7-day battery life.

name: Portable SSD 1TB
description: Ultra-fast external SSD with USB 3.2 Gen 2, shock-resistant casing, and compact pocket-size design.

name: Wireless Mouse
description: Ergonomic wireless mouse with precision tracking, long battery life, and comfortable grip for extended use.

name: Gaming Mouse Pad
description: Large RGB gaming mouse pad with smooth surface, water-resistant, and customizable lighting effects.

name: Bluetooth Speaker
description: Portable Bluetooth speaker with 360-degree sound, waterproof design, and 20-hour battery life.

name: USB-C Cable
description: Fast charging USB-C cable with data transfer up to 10Gbps, braided design, and 1.5m length.

name: Laptop Stand
description: Adjustable aluminum laptop stand with ergonomic design, improves posture and cooling.

name: Webcam HD 1080p
description: Full HD webcam with auto-focus, built-in microphone, and privacy shutter for video calls.

name: Wireless Earbuds
description: True wireless earbuds with active noise cancellation, 8-hour battery, and premium sound quality.

name: Gaming Headset
description: Surround sound gaming headset with noise-cancelling mic, RGB lighting, and comfortable memory foam ear cushions.

name: Tablet Stand
description: Adjustable tablet stand with 360-degree rotation, compatible with all tablet sizes, foldable design.

name: Power Bank 20000mAh
description: High-capacity power bank with fast charging, dual USB ports, and LED indicator for multiple device charging.

name: Monitor Stand
description: Dual monitor stand with gas spring arms, VESA compatible, cable management, and ergonomic height adjustment.

name: RGB LED Strip
description: Smart RGB LED strip with app control, voice commands, music sync, and 16 million colors.

name: USB Hub 4-Port
description: 4-port USB 3.0 hub with individual power switches, backward compatible, and compact design.
